description: This file defines a React functional component named RecipeGrid which renders a responsive grid of RecipeCard components. It manages displaying a message when no items are provided and maps over a list of recipe items to generate individual cards with interaction callbacks.

methods.name: RecipeGrid
methods.description: A React functional component that displays a grid of recipe cards. It accepts props for items, selection handler, and favorite toggling.

ctags.name: RecipeGrid
ctags.pattern: /^const RecipeGrid = ({ items, onSelect, isFavorite = () => false, onToggleFavorite = () => {} }) /

ctags.name: items

fields.name: const RecipeGrid = ({ items, onSelect, isFavorite = () => false, onToggleFavorite = () => {} }) /
